title: Deterministic Lockstep Games With Rollback For The Web
summary:
When deciding on the multiplayer structure for QuickGame, we had to find a solution that balanced the following

Performance
Ease of implementation
Developer experience.In the end, we chose a solution that was incredibly painful for the first two, but produced a developer experience that is unmatched in the industry. Here is the journey of the how, and the why...

title: Advanced TypeScript Type Tricks
summary: After spending some time in TypeScript you may begin to crave type safety everywhere in your life. JavaScript is an inherently unsafe language and there are dragons to be found everywhere and in almost every framework...
